1000020.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Arc Advent". Must be Ritual Summoned, and can then be Pendulum Summoned. You can only use each of the following effects of "Advent Arc Magician" once per turn. ● You can discard 1 card; take 1 "Magician" Pendulum Monster from your Deck and either place it face-up in your Pendulum Zone or add it to your Extra Deck face-up. ● If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can place it face-up in your Pendulum Zone, then you can draw 1 card.
1000020.name: Advent Arc Magician
1000020.pendulum_effect: If you have a "Magician" card in your other Pendulum Zone: You can destroy this card, and if you do, add 1 "Arc Advent" from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use this Pendulum Effect of "Advent Arc Magician" once per turn.

1000050.effect: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Advent Arc Magician" from your hand or GY, or that is face-up in your Extra Deck. You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 7 or more. If a "Magician" Pendulum Monster in your Monster Zone or Pendulum Zone would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY, instead.
1000050.name: Arc Advent
